name: Biomerica, Inc.
description: Biomerica, Inc. is a global company focused on the development, manufacturing, and marketing of innovative diagnostic products and medical devices. Established in 1980 and headquartered in Irvine, California, Biomerica specializes in the areas of gastrointestinal health, diabetes, and food sensitivity testing. The company is dedicated to improving the quality of life for patients through its advanced diagnostics that enable better health management and treatment outcomes. Biomerica's product portfolio includes a range of rapid tests that deliver accurate results in minutes, allowing healthcare providers to make timely decisions. In addition to its diagnostic tests, Biomerica is actively involved in research and development, with a strong commitment to creating new technologies that meet the evolving needs of the healthcare market. The company leverages its extensive expertise in biochemistry and medical technology to produce reliable and user-friendly products that are widely used in both clinical and home settings. With a focus on innovation, Biomerica continues to expand its product offerings and enhance its capabilities to serve a growing global customer base.
